events.message: Customer has filed a claim after their vehicle was involved in a collision with another car at a traffic intersection.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under the Auto Accident cluster due to the reported car crash.
An insurance agent has been assigned to the case to assist the claimant throughout the process with prompt support.
Acknowledgement of the auto accident claim has been sent to the customer confirming receipt and next steps.
The customer is requested to submit the accident report, vehicle registration, and photos of the damages.
All required documents, including police report and pictures of the damaged vehicle, have been submitted by customer.
Investigation into the circumstances of the collision and assessment of vehicle damage has commenced.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the claimant bears no fault and damage extent was properly documented.
A settlement offer was presented to the customer covering the repair costs of their vehicle according to policy limits.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the timely communication.
The claim has been approved by the insurance adjuster, confirming the full coverage of the auto repair expenses.
Payment to cover the vehicle repairs was issued electronically to the customerâ€™s bank account successfully.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed after successful settlement and payment completion.
All case documents and communication files related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
